thread.title: AT&T Authorized Retailer Opens New NJ Location

author: PR.com
title: AT&T Authorized Retailer Opens New NJ Location
text:
AT&T Authorized Retailer Opens New NJ Location
The Wireless Experience to open new location to open in Summit, New Jersey.
Toms River, NJ, October 11, 2015 --( PR.com )-- The Wireless Experience, a leading wireless solution and home automation AT&T retailer operating over 60 stores across the Northeast, is proud to announce the opening of its newest location in New Jersey.
The new store, located at 342 Springfield Ave in Summit, New Jersey, opened its doors in August, marking the sixth opening in recent months, with two new locations opened in Northeast Pennsylvania and three in the Greater Boston Area.
The store will offer the latest mobile devices and smartphones including the new Apple iPhone 6S and Samsung Smart Phones and Tablets, as well as a variety of wireless and home services including the DIRECTV bundle with NFL Sunday Ticket and AT&Tâ€™s Digital Life which offers new cutting edge home automation products.
Managing the Summit location will be Josh Starner, District Manager for Northern New Jersey, who comes to the Wireless Experience from Radio Shack. Josh brings experience as Regional Project Manager, as well as several years of leadership and sales experience in the wireless industry.
The store will celebrate its Grand Opening with special a ceremony on Monday, October 12 from 12-2pm. The Wireless Experience invites the community join them for a ribbon cutting ceremony, complementary gifts, prizes, and food/refreshments. Special guests from the Chamber of Commerce are expected to attend, and local radio station 103.5 WKTU will be broadcasting live from the event.
For more information visit www.thewirelessexperience.com
About The Wireless Experience
Headquartered in New Jersey, The Wireless Experience is a premier wireless solution and home automation AT&T retailer operating over 60 stores across the Northeast. To learn more about The Wireless Experience visit www.thewirelessexperience.com or call 1-800-NEW-TALK.
